chunk:
Plantkos Skincare Phyto Vitality Eye Cream

Brand: Plantkos

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Aqua, Cetearyl Olivate, Glycerin, Sorbitan Olivate, Propanediol, Behenyl Alcohol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuacu) Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Caprylate

, Glyceryl Caprylate, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Arachidyl Alcohol, Fructose, Bakuchiol, Xanthan Gum, Sclerotium Gum, Arachidyl Glucoside, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Sodium Phytate, Emblica Officinalis (Amla) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Withania Somnifera Flower Extract, Caffeine, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Ex

Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Darutoside, Citric Acid

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
